'''Weight''' a hidden attribute in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''{{'}}s physics system that affects the displacement of entities by [[Stagger]] effects and [[Vacuum Field]]s.

For example, the heavier the entity, the harder it is for them to be displaced in general.
